hero.subtitle: Join our young and innovative team for constant support, dynamic events, and B2B campaigns helping you discover your potential and launch a successful sales career.

values.title: Why choose RTT Commerce?
values.subtitle: Join our team for constant support, dynamic events, and B2B campaigns helping you discover your potential.

value1.title: Flexible support and freedom
value1.description: We provide supportive flexibility allowing you to grow at your own pace while having the backing of an experienced team.

value2.title: Career training opportunities
value2.description: Comprehensive training programs with personal coaching to develop into innovative coaches or business developers.

value3.title: Launch your sales career
value3.description: Hands-on experience in sales and marketing with direct support to help you discover your potential.

value4.title: Young & innovative team
value4.description: Join our dynamic team of young, energetic professionals passionate about stimulating business growth.

value5.title: Franchise growth opportunities
value5.description: Opportunities to grow into leadership roles managing sales teams or offices across Belgium.

value6.title: Experience through internships
value6.description: Internships designed to prepare students for real-world experience with practical learning opportunities.

about.title: Rapid growth in sales and marketing expertise in Belgium
about.description1: RTT Commerce supports businesses in growth. Scalable sales and marketing services tailored to specific business needs. Founded in 2017 in Antwerp, we've expanded to become a leading regional name by 2020, now pursuing a strong presence across all of Belgium.
about.description2: Our team is passionate about empowering young talent through personal sales and marketing specialization, offering customized services that help businesses achieve their growth objectives.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Empowering young talent through personal sales and marketing specialization, helping businesses achieve their growth objectives.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be Belgium's leading provider of scalable sales and marketing services, known for developing exceptional talent.

valuesSection.title: Values
valuesSection.description: Flexibility, growth, innovation, and support. We believe in nurturing potential and creating opportunities.

about.journeySubtitle: From a small startup in Antwerp to a Belgium-wide presence.

2017.title: Founded in Antwerp
2017.description: RTT Commerce was founded with a vision to empower young talent through personal sales and marketing.

2020.title: Regional expansion
2020.description: Expanded to become a leading regional name in Belgium's sales and marketing industry.

now.title: Belgium-wide presence
now.description: Now pursuing a strong presence across all of Belgium with offices in Brussels and beyond.
